description: PARIS – Iran’s men’s sitting volleyball team head coach Hadi Rezaei is extremely happy for winning eighth gold medal in the Paralympic Games.
title: Hadi Rezaei walking on air after winning gold with sitting volleyball

description: TEHRAN - Iran made a winning start to their Group A campaign in the AFC Asian Qualifiers - Road to 26 on Thursday as Amir Ghaleneoi’s side handed Kyrgyzstan a 1-0 defeat at Foolad Shahr Stadium but the critic hit out at the National Team’s performance.
title: Iran's victory overshadowed by criticisms

description: PARIS – Yasin Khosravi won Iran’s sixth gold medal in the men’s shot put- F57 of the 2024 Paralympic Games on Friday.
title: Khosravi wins Iran’s sixth gold at shot put in 2024 Paralympics

description: BEIRUT - Khadija Shukor says his father Fouad Shukor “always told us to hold firmly to the path of Seyyed Ali Khamenei and Seyyed Hassan Nasrallah.”
title: My father always told us to hold firmly to path of Seyyed Ali Khamenei and Seyyed Hassan Nasrallah

description: PARIS – Iran’s men’s sitting volleyball team claimed their eighth gold medal in the Paralympics, beating Bosnia and Herzegovina 3-1 (20-25, 30-28, 25-16, 25-14) on Friday in Paris.
title: Iran sitting volleyball win eighth gold at Paralympics

description: TEHRAN - In a note, Donya-e-Eqtesad dealt with China's positions regarding Iran's awaiting revenge against Israel and wrote: Shortly after Iran promised vengeance against Israel following the assassination of (Hamas leader) Ismail Haniyeh in Tehran, Chinese Foreign Minister Wang Yi said that China will support Iran in defense of its sovereignty, security, and national honor.
title: China's ambiguous support for Iran's revenge against Israel

description: TEHRAN – Iran has strongly dismissed recent accusations from the U.S. administration, which alleged that Tehran is attempting to interfere in the upcoming 2024 US presidential election.
title: Iran rejects U.S. claims of election interference, calls accusations ‘groundless’

description: TEHRAN – Foreign ministers of Iran and Bahrain recently held a significant discussion focused on strengthening bilateral ties and fostering political dialogue between the two nations.
title: Iran, Bahrain discuss future diplomatic ties amidst regional challenges

description: RAWALPINDI – Pakistan's Defense Day on September 6 serves as a symbolic reminder of the nation’s resilience and growing defense capabilities. It marks a day when Pakistan not only celebrates its military achievements but also reflects on its role in fostering regional stability.
title: Pakistan-Iran defense cooperation: navigating regional tensions and non-kinetic threats

description: TEHRAN – Mohammad Eslami, Head of the Atomic Energy Organization of Iran (AEOI), has firmly denied any deviations in Iran's nuclear program, referencing a recent anti-Iran announcement by the UN nuclear watchdog.
title: No deviation in Iran's nuclear program, nuclear chief says

description: TEHRAN – The commander of the Islamic Revolution Guard Corps Navy emphasized the strategic importance of the trio islands, which include Greater Tunb, Lesser Tunb, and Abu Musa.
title: IRGC commander highlights growing defensive strength of trio islands

description: TEHRAN – After 11 months of war and unrest in Gaza, a new conflict might be brewing in the region. Ilham Aliyev has doubled down on his efforts to establish a corridor to connect Nakhchivan to mainland Azerbaijan even if it leads to another military confrontation between the two old rivals, as stated by the president himself.
title: Borderlines: Iran’s red line

description: TEHRAN - Iran showed Chinese Taipei the door, 86-73, to qualify for the FIBA U18 Asia Cup 2024 Quarter-Finals, Friday at the Prince Hamza Hall.
title: Iran into FIBA U18 Asia Cup 2024 quarterfinals

description: PARIS - Rouhollah Rostami won the second consecutive Paralympic gold and broke the WR on the way with a 242kg lift at the 2024 Paralympic Games.
title: Powerlifter Rostami snatches gold at 2024 Paralympics

description: TEHRAN- Iranian Ambassador to Serbia, Rashid Hassanpour, recently engaged in discussions with the Serbian President regarding a range of bilateral, regional, and international matters.
title: Tehran, Belgrade vow closer cooperation in high-ranking meeting

description: TEHRAN- Iran's Permanent Representative to the United Nations has expressed grave concern about the threat posed by terrorist organizations seeking to obtain chemical weapons.
title: Iran sounds alarm over potential terrorist access to chemical weapons

description: TEHRAN- The Iranian Foreign Ministry summoned the UK's chargé d'affaires in Tehran on Tuesday, September 3, to protest new sanctions imposed by the British government on three Iranian individuals and one entity.
title: Tehran summons UK envoy over new anti-Iran sanctions

description: TEHRAN- Iranian President Masoud Pezeshkian reiterated his administration's unwavering dedication to supporting the Palestinian people and all those who are oppressed globally.
title: Pezeshkian pledges unfaltering support for Palestine

description: TEHRAN- The Georgian Foreign Minister has extended his congratulations to Abbas Araghchi on his recent appointment as Iran's minister of foreign affairs.
title: Georgian FM congratulates Iranian counterpart on appointment

description: TEHRAN- The chief of the Iranian Islamic Culture and Relations Organization has characterized 2025 as a pivotal year for cultural interactions between Iran and Turkey.
title: Iran, Turkey to increase collaboration in cultural affairs

description: TEHRAN - Amid ongoing clashes in southern Lebanon and the humanitarian crisis in Gaza, Israeli military forces have escalated their attacks in the West Bank, targeting the cities of Jenin and Tulkarem. On Wednesday, August 28, according to Palestinian authorities, hundreds of Israeli soldiers, supported by drones and armored vehicles, launched an offensive that resulted in the deaths of at least 10 Palestinians and injuries to dozens more.
title: Legacy of Izz ad-Din al-Qassam’s anti-colonial struggle alive in West Bank

description: TEHRAN - The Israeli army’s Gaza-like offensive in the West Bank has left a trail of death and destruction but the regime has failed to achieve its goals.
title: Suicide by seppuku: Israeli troops disillusioned as Hamas remains invincible

description: Lebanon’s Hezbollah said on Friday that it targeted and hit buildings in northern Israel’s Metula as well as an Israeli military barracks in the Shebaa Farms.
title: Hezbollah hits Israeli military targets

description: President Volodymyr Zelenskyy urged his Western allies to allow Ukraine to use long-range missiles to hit targets inside Russia and increase pressure on Moscow to end the war.
title: Zelenskyy urges Ukraine allies to allow long-range weapons use in Russia

description: The chief prosecutor of the International Criminal Court has defended arrest warrants for Israeli Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu, saying that justice must be seen to be done.
title: ICC chief prosecutor defends arrest warrants for Netanyahu

description: Sixty-one percent of Israelis do not trust Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu’s management of the war on the besieged Gaza Strip; or his ability to form a cabinet if early elections are held, an opinion poll by Israeli public broadcaster Kan revealed.
title: Poll: 61% of Israelis do not trust Netanyahu

description: TEHRAN – Archaeologists have unveiled a Sassanid-era fire temple in Rashidabad, Lorestan, after illegal excavation activities prompted an urgent excavation, revealing key elements of this ancient structure.
title: Sassanid-era fire temple ruins found in Lorestan after illegal excavation

description: TEHRAN - Mazandaran has experienced an unprecedented influx of visitors this summer, with 3.1 million overnight stays recorded in less than ten days, according to a local tourism official.
title: Mazandaran sets new tourist record with 3.1 million overnight stays

description: TEHRAN – Iran’s Kashan and Bulgaria’s Kazanlak formalized their sister city relationship on Sunday, highlighting their shared heritage in rose production.
title: Kashan, Kazanlak blossom as sister cities through rose heritage

description: TEHRAN - Iran’s Tourism Minister, Seyyed Reza Salehi-Amiri, has called for efforts to change global perceptions of Iran, promoting tourism and positioning Yazd as a gateway for this transformation.
title: Minister calls for overcoming negative stereotypes to boost tourism

description:
Paintings by Amir Mansour Almalou are currently on view in an exhibition at Vaali Gallery. 
The exhibition will continue until September 20 at the gallery located at 72 Khoddami St., Vanak Sq.
title: What’s in Tehran art galleries

description: TEHRAN- Iran has participated in the InteRussia theater training program currently taking place in Moscow, which immerses young talents from BRICS countries in the rich traditions of Russian theater.
title: Iran joins youth theater program in Moscow

description: TEHRAN-The cinematheque of the Tehran Museum of Contemporary Art (TMoCA) will show “The Battle of Algiers,” a 1966 Italian-Algerian war film co-written and directed by Gillo Pontecorvo, on Sunday.
title: TMoCA to show award-winning war film “The Battle of Algiers”

description: TEHRAN-Iran has participated in the 37th Moscow International Book Fair (MIBF), underway in the Russian capital from September 4 to 8.
title: Iran participating in Moscow International Book Fair with 400 titles

description: TEHRAN – The international symposium on the policy, legacy, and regulatory landscape of traditional and complementary medicine is scheduled to be held from November 21 to 23 in Tehran.
title: Intl. symposium on traditional, complementary medicine slated for November

description: TEHRAN –The International Day of Clean Air for Blue Skies is observed annually on September 7 highlighting the significance of raising public awareness at all levels, as well as promoting and facilitating actions to improve air quality.
title: Invest in clean air now!

description: TEHRAN – Information and Communication Technology (ICT) Minister, Sattar Hashemi, in separate meetings with his Kazakh and Kyrgyz counterparts, explored ways to foster cooperation in the ICT field.
title: Iran to boost ICT ties with Kazakhstan, Kyrgyzstan

description: TEHRAN –The 25th Iranian Plant Protection Congress will commence tomorrow in Tehran and is scheduled to wrap up on September 10.
title: Tehran to host Iranian Plant Protection Congress

description: Liquefied natural gas (LNG) has become the world’s most sought-after emergency energy source following Russia’s invasion of Ukraine on 24 February 2022. This is because it is readily available in the spot markets and can be moved quickly to anywhere required, unlike gas or oil sent through pipelines.
title: How Oman plays a role in Iran’s plan to become an LNG superpower

description: TEHRAN- Electricity has been supplied to 510 villages throughout the country during the past three years, Iran's Power Generation, Distribution, and Transmission Company (known as Tavanir) announced.
title: Electricity supplied to 510 villages in 3 years

description: TEHRAN - The Shipping Association of Iran has inked a memorandum of understanding (MOU) with the Advanced Training Course in Transport and Logistics in Barcelona, Spain, to enhance bilateral relations in the field of shipping lines.
title: Iran, Spain to expand cooperation in maritime transport services

description: TEHRAN - Increasing inter-city trips in the last month of summer in Iran have sent gasoline and gasoil consumption to new highs, according to the head of the National Iranian Oil Products Distribution Company (NIOPDC).
title: Gasoline consumption in Iran hits new record high

description: TEHRAN - Iran Chamber of Commerce, Industries, Mines, and Agriculture (ICCIMA) is scheduled to dispatch a trade delegation to Uzbekistan’s capital on September 19, the ICCIMA portal reported.
title: ICCIMA to dispatch trade delegation to Tashkent in late September

description: TEHRAN – The secretary general of the Organization of Petroleum Exporting Countries (OPEC) has thanked Iran’s former Oil Minister Javad Oji for his positive contribution to the organization, Tasnim News Agency reported.
title: OPEC chief praises Iran’s former oil minister

description: TEHRAN- The Indonesian Embassy in Iran celebrated the 79th anniversary of the country’s Independence Day at the place of Parsian Azadi Hotel in Tehran on Thursday evening (September 5).
title: Indonesia’s Independence Day celebrated in Tehran
